Digital Security Exchange (DSX)
About Who we are

The Digital Security Exchange helps the social sector stay safe from digital attack.

The DSX pairs social sector organizations with credible and trustworthy digital security experts and trainers who can help them keep their data and networks safe from exposure, exploitation, and attack.

This project is currently under development and we're aiming for a soft-launch in the 4th quarter of 2017. However, we are currently working with a limited number of organizations and providers, so if you need digital security assistance please be in touch via one of the methods below.

For more about DSX, go here.

Sign up for our (infrequent) emails to learn more and get involved:

If you are an organization seeking digital security assistance, or a provider looking to help, you can contact us via email. More contact options coming soon.
